Class Dog

  • java.lang.Object
    • Dog

  • public class Dog
extends java.lang.Object
    A class to hold data about a dog at a clinic.
    Version:
    January 29, 2018
    Author:
    Tyson Kendon

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Dog(int id, java.lang.String name, int year, int month, int day)
      Creates a new dog with an id, a name and a birthdate.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getAge()
      Returns the "human" age of the dog, the actual number of years since it was born.
      int getAgeInDogYears()
      Returns the "dog" age of the dog.
      java.util.Calendar getDateOfBirth()
      Returns the dog's date of birth as a Calendar.
      int getID()
      Returns the unique id of the dog.
      java.util.Calendar getLastAppointment()
      Returns the date of the dog's last appointment at the clinic.
      java.lang.String getName()
      Returns the name of the dog.
      void setLastAppointment(int year, int month, int day)
      Sets the year, month and day of the dog's last appointment at the clinic.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Dog

        public Dog(int id,
           java.lang.String name,
           int year,
           int month,
           int day)
        Creates a new dog with an id, a name and a birthdate.
        Parameters:
        id - the unique identifier for the dog
        name - the dog's name
        year - the year of the dog's birth
        month - the month of the dog's birth
        day - the day of the dog's birth

    • Method Detail

      • getAge

        public int getAge()
        Returns the "human" age of the dog, the actual number of years since it was born.

      • getAgeInDogYears

        public int getAgeInDogYears()
        Returns the "dog" age of the dog. The age is adjusted so that the age would be equivelent to the same lifespan in a human.

      • getDateOfBirth

        public java.util.Calendar getDateOfBirth()
        Returns the dog's date of birth as a Calendar.

      • getID

        public int getID()
        Returns the unique id of the dog.

      • getLastAppointment

        public java.util.Calendar getLastAppointment()
        Returns the date of the dog's last appointment at the clinic.
        Returns:
        date of last appointment, or null if no last appointment

      • getName

        public java.lang.String getName()
        Returns the name of the dog.

      • setLastAppointment

        public void setLastAppointment(int year,
                               int month,
                               int day)
        Sets the year, month and day of the dog's last appointment at the clinic.
        Parameters:
        year - the year of the appointment
        month - the month of the appointment
        day - the day of the appointment
